title: LogLion Funnel Configuration
description: Schema for LogLion funnel configuration files

format.description: Log format type. Use 'plain' for text-based logs and 'logcat-json' for JSON logcat files.

name.description: Name of the step (must be unique within the funnel)

event_pattern.description: Regular expression pattern to match events

additionalProperties.description: Regular expression pattern for property value

required_properties.description: Map of property names to regex patterns that must match

timestamp_format.description: Go time format string for parsing timestamps. Empty for plain format.

event_regex.description: Regular expression to extract event data from log lines. Defaults based on format.

json_extraction.description: Whether to attempt JSON parsing from extracted event data

log_line_regex.description: Regular expression to parse the entire log line structure
